text: Bruce Jenner speaks! The former Olympian finally opened up about his transition from male to female in a highly anticipated interview with ABC News'Diane Sawyer. The two - hour special edition of 20 / 20, titled Bruce Jenner : The Interview, saw the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star speak out for the first time about his transgender identity. PHOTOS : Bruce Jenner Through the Years The motivational speaker, 65, did not hold back, revealing five minutes in to the special, ` ` I am a woman. Us Weekly live - blogged the full two hours, which aired Friday, April 24, and, as insiders told Us in the new issue of the magazine, was the first step the father of 10 took ` ` to reintroduce himself to society as a woman.''
